rules_text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. You draw a card and you lose 1 life for each creature sacrificed this way.
flavor_text:
[i]“She felt lost; confused; helpless. But in her final moment, there was acceptance.”
—Eve Inn, the New Champion[/i]
